outline:
1. to smite through, shatter, wound severely
    1. (Qal)
      1. to shatter
      2. shattering (participle)
kjv_def: dip, pierce (through), smite (through), strike through, wound.
strongs_def: to dash asunder; by implication, to crush, smash or violently plunge; figuratively, to subdue or destroy
